title: Cure Natural Aqua Gel 250ml - Best selling exfoliator in Japan!
description: Cure Natural Aqua Gel is the #1 best selling exfoliator in Japan, selling 1 bottle every 12 seconds. Cure's unique and gentle formula allows for it to be used on people with even the most sensitive skin. Cure's status as a cult hit and Japanese beauty product legend stems from the simple fact that Cure does what it promises: exfoliates gently and effectively, without any harsh chemicals or alcohol.

title: L'Oreal Paris Studio Line Melting Gel, Strong Hold, 6.8 Fluid Ounce
Revlon Color Stay Whipped Crème Makeup, Warm Golden, 0.8 Fluid Ounce
description: Revlon color stay whipped crème makeup is designed to move with your skin, this bouncy, mousse-like formula feels lightweight and comfortable, so makeup looks flawless and feels fresh throughout the day, without rubbing off. New time release technology formula helps keep skin looking flawless all day.
